title: ABU celebrates the International Day for Disaster Risk Reduction (ABU - Asia-Pacific Broadcasting Union)
text: ( Source : ABU - Asia-Pacific Broadcasting Union ) Since 1990 , the 13 of October has been designated by the United Nations as the International Day for Disaster Risk Reduction . The objective of the observance is to raise awareness of how
